coyote/

cgfindcoyotefiles.pro


top source cgFindCoyoteFiles

Utility

cgFindCoyoteFiles

This procedure looks for Coyote Library routines in every directory in the IDL path and reports the directories that it strongly suspects contain Coyote Library files. The purpose of this is to aid in eliminating old and out-dated Coyote Library routines from your IDL path. The goal is to have a single Coyote Library directory with the latest Coyote Library programs in it.
